message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a limited time at the special price of $200.  It's a great deal, what do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $60 is too low, I could come down to $180.  It's still a fantastic price for this!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $180 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $120?
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible, but I can't go as low as $120.  My final offer is $160.  This is a great price for this item, so I hope you'll consider it.
I'm getting close to walking away, but I'm still willing to make one more offer. Would you be willing to meet me at $140?
